Title: json_objectagg
Feature: json_objectagg ( [ { key_expression { VALUE | ':' } value_expression } ] [ { NULL | ABSENT } ON NULL ] [ { WITH | WITHOUT } UNIQUE [ KEYS ] ] [ RETURNING data_type [ FORMAT JSON [ ENCODING UTF8 ] ] ])
Description: Behaves like json_object, but as an aggregate function, so it only takes one key_expression and one value_expression parameter.
Examples: SELECT json_objectagg(k:v) FROM (VALUES ('a'::text,current_date),('b',current_date + 1)) AS t(k,v) â†’ { "a" : "2022-05-10", "b" : "2022-05-11" }
